item.title: Thirty years of tech, where are we now?
item.description: This January marks the 30 year anniversary of the Apple //e and the Apple Lisa. While the Apple //e had profound effects on the computer world throughout the 80s, I am in awe of how much the Apple Lisa foretold of the computing world. No matter what your thoughts are â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
